text: Hey! Sorry i've been so rubbish at getting back on here - how exciting! Being a producer is great - you get a wonderful overview of projects and get to work with creative people while playing to your strengths.

I can definitely run you through an overview of a day in the life of a project manager - and i'll also connect you with my friend Andy who is an incredible VFX producer. He could definitely give you more specific advice!
That would be amazing, thank you! Iâ€™m currently helping to VFX produce a short film so any tips on producing or project management would be incredibly useful at this time! :grin:
